Name: Adventure Field™ 3 Definitive Edition
About the game: This game took over 3 years to make and was made with some ripped assets and music from other popular game, mostly music. It is an old game that i refreshed and published on steam for you to enjoy for free, that is why the game is free (F2P) and will remain free forever . Hope you will enjoy the game for what it is and not for what assets it use! The DLC are 100% none vital to the game. The game can be finished entirely without those... These dlc are only there to support me if you like the game! English is not my first language and back then i decided to make the game in English even if i was not good so that more people would understand it and play it around the world... Please don't be mean, it is a free game... As of version 3.0.0.0 the game text as been changed a little to help the player understand the story and the lore a little more... It is 2017, you are Atoa, a young student living in the country of Sarook. Day after day living the perfect young student life, you begin to feel something is not right. In a dream you see a sword, a sword with a powerful aura. The very next day, the said sword is sent to the future from the past for you to find it. You then get teleported to a kingdom long forgotten. Not so forgotten because it is the same place but 1100 b.c. You have to fight your way home with no real promises of success... This game is a 25 hours side view battle JRPG in the taste of all the classic rpg game from the beloved super Nintendo era... With the game now available on Steam, a complete set of 90 steam achievements can be unlocked through out the game! To use controller connected by USB go to your Windows Game Controller Setting and choose advanced... Choose your controller as the preferred default controller in the drop down menu! We really hope you will all enjoy this epic adventure!
